# Bubonic Plague
## Overview
**Type:** disease, injury or inhaled

**Save:** Fortitude DC 17

**Onset:** 1 day

**Frequency:** 1/day

**Effect:** 1d4 Con damage and 1 Cha damage and target is [[Fatigued|fatigued]]

**Cure:** 2 consecutive saves
